/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A brick wall runs along the right side of the street, providing a contrast to the natural elements. On the left side of the street, a blue fence stands out against the greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the scene.
